name: CIEEM: Summer Conference - Integrated Management of the Marine Environment
content: This one day conference will look to understand the external impacts on the marine environment and how an integrated management approach can deliver multiple benefits. To explore effective approaches to ecological impact assessment in the Marine environments and to discuss the required elements of a post-Brexit integrated marine management policy and legislative landscape. Keynote Speaker: Professor Stuart Rogers (Chief Scientist) CEFAS Professor Dickon Howell (Director) Howell Marine Consulting Programme: https://www.cieem.net/data/files/Summer\_Conference\_2017/CIEEM\_2017\_Summer\_Conference\_Programme\_V1.pdf
